label: LogisticsPackaging
comment: Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication whether or not this logistics packaging has a certification.
A code specifying a condition of this logistics packaging.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a disposal method for this logistics packaging.
Information, expressed as text, concerning the transport of these dangerous goods.
A code specifying an instruction for these trade payment terms.
The indication of whether or not this logistics packaging has an instruction.
The code specifying the level for this logistics risk analysis result.
The textual description of the method of logistics packaging, such as hermetically sealed.
The type, expressed as text, of supply chain packaging.
The indication of whether or not this logistics package is returnable.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: Instructions applicable to this logistics packaging.
A measure of a capacity of this logistics packaging.
A package contained in this logistics packaging.
A number of content layers in this logistics packaging.
A linear dimension or a set of linear dimensions of this logistics packaging.
The number of units of this type of logistics packaging which can be stacked on top of each other.
A marking specified for this logistics packaging.
A total number of units contained in this logistics packaging.
A measure of a weight (mass) of this logistics packaging.

referencedBy.comment: Logistics packaging applicable to this trade product.
